Text:
As always new awesome Collection of music.

These Torrents are the possibility to look for new music I have been waiting on for years.

Keep on the good work :) Cant wait for march.

Thanks TomaLexi. Glad you enjoy the mixes :)

The March mixtape is already loooing good with the track by Aereogramme and Hal Duncan from 'Ballads of the Book' ready and waiting (probably my favourite track of 2007 so far)!

Yo Shanks, ya does it again!!

Multi thanks and a riceball from the land of the rising sun. 

domo arigatogozaimasu
excellent ... can't wait to hear what you've got for us this time ...
Wow! Thanks for this chance to discover great stuff I missed out on. Brilliant! Is this a monthly? Then I'm a new subscriber...
Thanks for the comments. Yes I'll try and keep these coming regularly. Check around the start of each month or just do a search for "Shankly" :)

Hey thanks, to be honest I do not really like all these emo "i cant make good music but I am such a stylish individual come check me out" stuff and mainstream 'alternative' bands
but in your mixes there is always a handful really great artists I did not know before.

So keep up the good work :)
